profile:
Kovar Contracting provides roofing, siding, eavestrough and soffit/fascia services in the greater Ottawa area.

We provide high quality service and workmanship using the best available products. We Offer a 50 year non-prorated warranty on all shingle roofs.

For a limited time, we are offering 50% off gutter guard with eavestrough installation!

Our services include:
Free estimates
Re-roofing
New construction roofing
Ventilation installation
Flashing replacement
Skylight installation and replacement
Seamless evestrough installation
Ice and snow removal

profile:
At Excel Building & Roofing we are "On top of what matters most" with specialties in residential and commercial roofing and renovations in the Ottawa and surrounding area. As an Ottawa contractor we deliver the best in quality, workmanship and insist the job is done right the first time. 

With all the chaos that comes with our day to day lives we know that any home project, needed or wanted, can seem both overwhelming and out of reach. At Excel Building & Roofing we are with you every step of the way.

Our team has over 25 years combined experience in the field and we are extremely motivated to make a change in the way this city views the construction industry. "A lot of companies are faceless and in it for a quick buck. This isn't just a "job" for us and our clients are not just "another project", this is how we make our living and support our family." 

Call us picky, but quality is a prerequisite and a bad job is simply unacceptable. We do not rush jobs and choose our materials and team very carefully to ensure it is done right the first time.

When you choose Excel you receive:
- A Green Company, we recycle 100% of materials removed from your home.
- Superior quality and workmanship   
- Always above standard materials and installation
- Constant management - during and after installation inspections 
- No hidden fees or extras, what we quote you is what you pay.

*** Ottawa Roofing experts***

profile: Siding, Stucco, Stone, Brick, Masonry and Fireplaces From design to installation, Stone Selex Design is a premier company with over 20 years of experience providing both residential and commercial customers with quality installation and a high level of customer satisfaction. Stone Selex Design is committed to providing full service installation for your exterior or interior stone veneer project. We also provide installation of stone veneer, stucco, brick, masonry and fireplace transformations. Design your own project with the NEW Stone Veneer Visualizer and have Stone Selex Design install it for you. The Visualizer gives you the ability to envision your project from the comfort of your computer screen. It has the power to transform a photo of your home into a professional digital rendering by adding siding, stucco and stone. Make your home the talk of the neighbourhood with stone and stucco, or stone and brick, or siding and brick, stone tile and wood siding. The possibilities of style and colour combinations are endless. A Stone Selex Design project manager will help you with each stage of your project from where to add stone, stucco, siding, brick and masonry and provide you with a quote for our installation services provided by our experienced masonry installers. If it’s a fireplace that you want to create or just simply add stone or masonry, Stone Selex Design and the visualizer can help you with this too. While you are in the planning stages of your fireplaces transformation the visualizer is a great tool to use. Look through photos for ideas and see what others are doing and then come to Stone Selex Design and ask us to install it for you. Visit us here: https://twitter.com/StoneSelex https://www.facebook.com/StoneSelexInc/

profile:
At Kaloozie Comfort, we take pride in giving priority to our customers and their needs. Quality and customer service are what distinguish us from the others.  We strive to exceed our customers expectations and surpass their needs and requirements.
 
We're a family owned business specializing in making your home the best it can be, while providing you with options and saving you money.  We supply and install energy saving exterior renewal products.  
​ 
​Our team has over 40 years of home improvement expertise and a commitment to customer excellence.  It would be our pleasure to consult with you on any project plans you have in mind.
 
Kaloozie Comfort specializes in a consultative approach to your project planning. Style, color and material choices are the hardest decisions to make. We come equipped with vast experiences to help you design your changes. This expertise is free so invite us to your table and put us to the test.

Sub-contracts working at heights work.
products:
Kaloozie Comfort is proud to represent a portfolio of Canadian manufactured products.
Kaycan Siding
Interlock Metal Roofing
Eurostar Windows and Doors
services:
We install and repair siding, soffit, fascia and evestrough.
We also install windows ranging from economical to high-end European designs in Ottawa.
We are pleased to partner with Interlock Aluminum Roofing as their sales team in Ottawa.
brands:
Kaycan Ottawa,
Interlock Metal Roofing Ottawa,
Eurostar Windows and Doors in Ottawa.
specialities:
Consultative approach to project management.
From dream to reality project planning.
We also do interior trades as we have highly skilled tradesmen available to assist in any project you might want to plan.

profile:
Based in the Nations Capital, the Parliament Contracting team has over ten years experience in the roofing & siding industry. Thriving to provide only the best materials and labour at affordable prices. Let us help protect your investment and call us today for your FREE no-obligation estimate.

Our expert team of roofers are available to answer all your roofing questions Monday to Friday from 7am to 7pm and Saturday and Sunday from 9am to 5pm. Our emergency roof repair services are available to you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

Let the premier Ottawa roofing & siding company improve your home comfort and save you money and energy consumption today. We are ready to provide you a safe and sturdy job for many years to come.

Recently awarded the title of Best of Eastern Ontario for Roofing & Siding companies by HomeStars, Rydel Roofing has more than 30 years of experience as Ottawa's premier roofing service companies. Boasting an A+ BBB Rating, a perfect Facebook Review score and a 97% customer review rating on HomeStars, our business is driven by a passion for elevated customer service, quality craftsmanship and old fashioned honesty. We have been certified to install almost every major roofing and siding product in North America so you can rest assured that our projects are covered under warranty.

Need financing? Ask our team how you can get 24 month ZERO INTEREST equal payments on your latest project! 

Services/Products:
Asphalt Roofing, Metal Roofing, Flat Roofing, Roofing Repairs, Eavestrough and Gutter, Siding, Roofing Products, Roofing Ventilation, Commercial Roofing, Residential Roofing

In business since: 2012

http://rydelroofing.com/
1800 Woodward Dr, Ottawa, ON K2C 0P7

profile:
Alteck Group Ltd. is a top leader in reliable interior and exterior services and quality construction. We specialize in commercial and residential siding.  Our mission is to provide quality products and services at a fair and competitive price. We strive to create and maintain a friendly, courteous, and professional relationship with all of our clients and our focus has always been on quality workmanship with superior products.

***
Contact us today to book your appointment. We look forward to hearing from you.

profile:
TACK construction is a family-operated and managed business that's been serving Ottawa and area since 2017. Our business is committed to maintaining superior quality and great relationships with all of our clients. not only do we want to serve you, but we also want to be able to meet your desired outcome on any project we engage. From new siding, insulation, garage & window capping, roofing, eavestrough, leaf guard etc.
NOTE: Due to the current situation, TACK is engaging in safe practices. Complete estimates will be completed without in-person client interaction. We will do estimates from outdoors and connect with clients via email and phone to discuss things such as material selections and design. We want to ensure that everyone's safety is top priority.
services: We install and repair all types of siding, facia and soffit. New roofs to roofing repairs.
specialities: From the planning and design stage, materials selection to making your vision a reality. Tack engages with clients from start to finish assisting and maintaining any projects. Stress free.
licenses: Working at Heights and all Safety Certifications
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Length of warranty varies depending on types of service provided.
